
### wait/waitpid  {.smaller}


* <code>pid_t waitpid(pid_t pid, int *status, <br>   int options)</code>
* wait for a child process (with pid=<code>pid</code>) to finish
* sets <code>*status</code> to its ‘‘status information’’ 
<hr class="vspace" />
* <code>pid=-1</code> $\\rightarrow{}$ wait for any child process instead 

   * <code>pid=0</code> almost the same

* options? see manual page (command <code>man waitpid</code>) 

   * <code>0</code> --- no options
